Name: Over the Counter
About the game: Make drugs, skirt the law and confront ethical dilemmas as you try to survive 20 years in the big pharmaceutical business. RESEARCH Employ scientists to invent disease treatments PRODUCE Optimise the factory line from warehouse to store SELL Analyse news events to forecast disease prevalence trends CAMPAIGN Launch disease awareness campaigns to increase drug demand LAWYER UP Hire lawyers to defend your unethical acts DECIDE Will you become corrupted by corporate greed?
